attributes.action: Rescind the Order for the prorogation of Parliament
attributes.additional_details: By precedent, the Queen will not refuse a Humble Address
attributes.background: That a humble address be presented to Her Majesty, that she will be graciously pleased to procure that her government forthwith convenes a meeting of Her Majesty’s Privy Council and submits thereto a draft Order to rescind the Order made by it on 28 August 2019 for the prorogation of parliament.
